Title: When It Rains
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Lamar Abrams, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: When Steven helps a friend who is afraid of storms, a new alliance is formed.
